#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

//Logic : Convert every number into its binary representation,
// and for every set bit, try to multiply that bit position with 5 to the power bit position
// Example : 9 = 1001 = 1*5 + 0*25 + 0*125 + 1*625 = 630
// 11 = 1011 = 1*5 + 1*25 + 0*125 + 1*625 = 655

 int main()
 {int t,n;
  long long sum,m;
 scanf("%d%",&t);
 while(t--)
  {scanf("%d",&n);
   sum=0;
   m=5;
   while(n>0)
    {if(n&1)  //true if last bit is 1
      sum+=m;
     n>>=1;
     m*=5;
    }
   printf("%d\n",sum);
   
   
  }
 system("pause");
 return 0;
}
